voice_severity_session_id.description: Unique identifier for the voice severity session.

voice_severity_duration.description: Duration of the assessment for the severity of the participant's voice issues.

describe_the_severity_of_a.description: Asks the participant to describe the severity of a specific condition or symptom.

question.en: Describe the severity of auditory-perceptual attributes of a voice problem*Overall severity scale (0-100)
